Example using heteroskedastic robust standard errors in R

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(lmtest)
library(sandwich)
library(car)

data("iris")

iris <- iris %>% 
  as_data_frame()

head(iris)

iris_model <- lm(Sepal.Length ~ Sepal.Width + Petal.Length + Species, data = iris)

summary(iris_model)

coeftest(iris_model,  vcovHC(iris_model, "HC1"))
```
